mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.tcoperator AS "tcoperator", a.tcaccnum AS "tcaccnum", a.tcsitenum AS "tcsitenum", a.tcpaydate AS "tcpaydate", a.tcpredate AS "tcpredate", a.tccurdate AS "tccurdate", a.tcpredisplay AS "tcpredisplay", a.tccurdisplay AS "tccurdisplay", a.tcprestartdisplay AS "tcprestartdisplay", a.tcpreenddisplay AS "tcpreenddisplay", a.tcrate AS "tcrate", a.tcloss AS "tcloss", a.tctotalq AS "tctotalq", a.tcpriceq AS "tcpriceq", a.tcparc AS "tcparc", a.tcpartype AS "tcpartype", a.tcpartypet AS "tcpartypet", a.tctaxfactor AS "tctaxfactor", a.tccmq AS "tccmq", a.tcctq AS "tcctq", a.tccuq AS "tccuq", a.tctotalc AS "tctotalc", a.tcpue AS "tcpue", a.tccheck AS "tccheck", a.tcc AS "tcc", a.tcapportchange AS "tcapportchange", a.tcremarks AS "tcremarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_transit_receiptinfo( id, tcoperator, tcaccnum, tcsitenum, tcpaydate, tcpredate, tccurdate, tcpredisplay, tccurdisplay, tcprestartdisplay, tcpreenddisplay, tcrate, tcloss, tctotalq, tcpriceq, tcparc, tcpartype, tcpartypet, tctaxfactor, tccmq, tcctq, tccuq, tctotalc, tcpue, tccheck, tcc, tcapportchange, tcremarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{tcoperator}, #{tcaccnum}, #{tcsitenum}, #{tcpaydate}, #{tcpredate}, #{tccurdate}, #{tcpredisplay}, #{tccurdisplay}, #{tcprestartdisplay}, #{tcpreenddisplay}, #{tcrate}, #{tcloss}, #{tctotalq}, #{tcpriceq}, #{tcparc}, #{tcpartype}, #{tcpartypet}, #{tctaxfactor}, #{tccmq}, #{tcctq}, #{tccuq}, #{tctotalc}, #{tcpue}, #{tccheck}, #{tcc}, #{tcapportchange}, #{tcremarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_transit_receiptinfo SET tcoperator = #{tcoperator}, tcaccnum = #{tcaccnum}, tcsitenum = #{tcsitenum}, tcpaydate = #{tcpaydate}, tcpredate = #{tcpredate}, tccurdate = #{tccurdate}, tcpredisplay = #{tcpredisplay}, tccurdisplay = #{tccurdisplay}, tcprestartdisplay = #{tcprestartdisplay}, tcpreenddisplay = #{tcpreenddisplay}, tcrate = #{tcrate}, tcloss = #{tcloss}, tctotalq = #{tctotalq}, tcpriceq = #{tcpriceq}, tcparc = #{tcparc}, tcpartype = #{tcpartype}, tcpartypet = #{tcpartypet}, tctaxfactor = #{tctaxfactor}, tccmq = #{tccmq}, tcctq = #{tcctq}, tccuq = #{tccuq}, tctotalc = #{tctotalc}, tcpue = #{tcpue}, tccheck = #{tccheck}, tcc = #{tcc}, tcapportchange = #{tcapportchange}, tcremarks = #{tcremarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
